title: Super Modern 1 bed Cheeseman Park 5 mins to Downtown Ballpark Lodo
neighborhood: Denver Downtown Golden Triangle Uptown Cap Hill
posting_body: Beautiful 1 bed 1 bath available for move in August 27.
Message me (Blake) Quick for fast personal showings or virtual / FaceTime showings
This pet-friendly apartment home gives you everything you want and need in your next home.
This luxurious and sleek apartment home offers modern style.
From large walk-in closets to in-home washers and dryers, the apartment interiors combine all the most important features.
Around the community, you can find panoramic Rocky Mountain views and a rooftop spa, making living even better beyond your front door.
Ideally located on 11th Avenue in Denver, the community provides you access to dining, shopping, arts, entertainment and recreation.

Denver Botanic Gardens, Cheesman Park and Congress Park are all within a few blocks from the front door, and neighborhood favorites like Tattered Cover Book Store, Twist & amp; Shout Records and Liks Ice Cream are not much further.
Schedule your tour today and see why living at this property is the best of downtown Denver.
*Restrictions Apply, pricing, availability, and lease terms subject to change anytime.
